snippet: Following accusations that the case was being ignored by the national news media, reporters descended Monday on Philadelphia, where Dr. Kermit Gosnell was on trial.
abstract: Reporters swarm case against Philadelphia abortion provider Dr Kermit Gosnell after online furor that case was being ignored by national media because of troubling accounts of late-term abortions; Gosnell is charged with killing seven viable fetuses at his clinic.
lead_paragraph: Following accusations that the case was being ignored by the national news media, reporters descended Monday on Philadelphia, where Dr. Kermit Gosnell was on trial.

headline.seo: Online Furor Draws Press to Abortion Doctor’s Trial
headline.main: Online Furor Draws Press to Abortion Doctor’s Trial
headline.print_headline: Online Furor Draws Press to Abortion Doctor’s Trial
